TEXT.TITLE: ORANGE-CO <OJ> HOLDERS APPROVE NAME CHANGE
TEXT.BODY: Orange-Co Inc said shareholders at the annual meeting approved a name change to Stoneridge Resources Inc. The company said yesterday shareholders of American Agronomics Corp <AGR>, which acquired Orange-Co's Orange-Co of Florida subsidiary late in 1986, approved a name change to Orange-Co Inc. Reuter
